cartography

Display one Cartographic Palette

Display one color palette.

display.carto.pal(name)

Arguments

name
name of the palette available in the package (see Details).

Details

Sequential palettes:

  • blue.pal
  • orange.pal
  • red.pal
  • brown.pal
  • green.pal
  • purple.pal
  • pink.pal
  • wine.pal
  • grey.pal
  • turquoise.pal
  • sand.pal
  • taupe.pal
  • kaki.pal
  • harmo.pal

Qualitative palettes:

  • pastel.pal
  • multi.pal

See also

carto.pal, display.carto.all, carto.pal.info

Examples 

display.carto.pal("orange.pal")
display.carto.pal("sand.pal")

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Details
  • See also
  • Examples
